description: Directory traversal vulnerability in T&D Data Server (Japanese Edition) Ver.2.22 and earlier, T&D Data Server (English Edition) Ver.2.30 and earlier, THERMO RECORDER DATA SERVER (Japanese Edition) Ver.2.13 and earlier, and THERMO RECORDER DATA SERVER (English Edition) Ver.2.13 and earlier allows a remote attacker to view an arbitrary file on the server via unspecified vectors.

product.name: T&D Data Server and THERMO RECORDER DATA SERVER

enisaIdProduct.product_version: T&D Data Server (Japanese Edition) Ver.2.22 and earlier, T&D Data Server (English Edition) Ver.2.30 and earlier, THERMO RECORDER DATA SERVER (Japanese Edition) Ver.2.13 and earlier, and THERMO RECORDER DATA SERVER (English Edition) Ver.2.13 and earlier
